name: Monster Match - Connect The Monsters With Pipes!
name_original: Monster Match - Connect The Monsters With Pipes!
description:
Monster Match is a simple, addictive FREE puzzle game with over 700 levels!

Connect the monsters with the pipes to create a match. Match all monsters and cover the whole board with color to solve the levels. Beware - matches will break if they overlap or cross!

Just go with the flow - play it your way, aim for accuracy and perfect scores, or just match the dots. Quick as you can, or nice and relaxed.

Monster Match Features:
- Over 700 levels to play through
- Board size ranges from 5x5 to 14x14 on the iPad!
- Additional level packs can be purchased
- Time trial mode for an additional challenge
- Atmospheric music
- 14 cute monsters!
